hadith.chapter: Virtues and Merits of the Prophet (pbuh) and his Companions - كتاب المناقب
hadith.arabic-text: حدثنا قبيصة، حدثنا سفيان، عن عبد الملك بن عمير، عن جابر بن سمرة، رفعه قال ‏"‏ إذا هلك كسرى فلا كسرى بعده وذكر وقال لتنفقن كنوزهما في سبيل الله ‏"‏‏.‏
hadith.english-text: Narrated Jabir bin Samura: The Prophet said, "When Khosrau perishes, there will be no more Khosrau a after him, and when Caesar perishes, there will be no more Caesar after him," The Prophet also said, "You will spend the treasures of both of them in Allah's Cause."
